thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant 1 night break
thread.title_full: Brilliant 1 night break - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: vray75
title: Brilliant 1 night break
text:
We chose the hotel due to its location to Olympia and London. It was in easy walking distance from the tube & bus station. We caught the bus to Olympia but it could easily be walked (we have a 5 year old and we did not want to wear her out).
The staff/service excellent. The hotel receptionist (sorry don't know her name) went out of her way to make our daughter feel welcome. Thank you, you really made her visit special. All members of staff were friendly and always had a smile.
Rooms are a good size with very comfortable beds. You could easily stay in them for a couple of nights and have a decent nights sleep. As with other Holiday Inn Express hotels a good breakfast selection.
Will definitely stay again when we visit London for business and leisure.
